text: ---Pata nahi tu kabhi card magic se bore kyoun nahi hota tha, last year bahut se jaadu sikhaye vibhav ne par sabse best to wo 2 magic hi the, jispe kabhi bhi hassi aa jati hai.. Sabse pehle to apna milna huaa tha ig summers of 2nd year, jab 4 log milke pubg khela karte the, yaad hai amit aur arya bot mai rehte the aur tu upar aaya karta tha har roj mere room pe, mujhe abhi tak samajh nahi aaya ki tu mobile se bhi itna aacha kaise khel leta tha... Aur fir to last ke 1 month mai to roj wo night out marna hameesha yaad rahega, mujhe yaad rahega hameesha ki apan log mafia khelne upar gaye the aur 3 game tak to tujhe 1st round mai hi kill kar dete the harami dost.... Japan chala jayega tu ab par jab bhi mai cards khelunga hameesha teri aur apne squad ki yaad jaroor aayegi.. Baat karte rehna and i hope kabhi japan ki trip pe bhi leke jayega tu.. Good luck for your future bhai..
author: Sameer  Yadav
